name: Fire Agate & Aventurine
description: Find luck, security, safety and more with this genuine Fire Agate and Aventurine gemstone necklace. Green Aventurine is the stone of luck and chance. It is said to increase perception and creative insight. It is a heart chakra stone, and is a powerful crystal healing stone and can be used to balance and energize the heart chakra. It is believed to help treat disorders of the heart, lungs, adrenal glands, muscular and urogenital systems. It is used to aid nearsightedness. Fire Agate has a deep calming energy that brings security and safety. It is a protection stone with strong grounding powers. Fire agate links to the fire element and is used as an aid to improve sexual activity, stimulating vitality and opening the base chakra. Hold a fire agate to inspire inner knowledge to emerge in the resolution of problems. It also helps in overcoming addictions, and other destructive desires. Assist with healing the stomach, nervous, endocrine systems, strengthen night vision, and reduce hot flashes. Learn more about the stone(s) used in this piece by clicking by clicking HERE.

name: Slate Blue Faux Pearl Set
description: Complement just about any outfit with this set. Pair with jeans for girls night out or dress it up with an evening dress, either way you'll love the elegance this set brings.

name: Red Jasper & Turquoise
description: Red Jasper is gently stimulating and also an extremely protective stone. It can neutralize radiation and other forms of environmental and electromagnetic pollution. Red Jasper rectifies unjust situations and grounds energy. Brings problems to light and provides insights into difficult situations. An excellent “worry bead”, Red Jasper calms the emotions. Aids in dream recall. Cleans and stabilizes the aura. A stone of health, Red Jasper strengthens and detoxifies the circulatory system, blood and liver. Turquoise is considered to be a symbol of generosity, sincerity, and affection. It preserves friendships and can make friends out of enemies in time. Traditionally is said to only bring good luck if given, not purchased. However, this is not always the case. One must take into consideration the innate energy of each stone individually. Learn more about the stone(s) used in this piece by clicking by clicking HERE.
